page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: In Weaverham there are three churches, the Methodist Chapel,St Marys Church of England,St Bedes Catholic Church.St Marys Church Vicar is Rev.G.E.Parsons. Services each Sunday at 8.30am 11.30am,6.30pm.Each Wednesday at 10.30 am.Sunday School 11.00am.Clubs are: Choir,Ladies Group,Toddlers, Mothers Union, Mens Society and Bell Ringers. Attached to the Catholic Church is St Bedes School,the church and the School are both modern. Hartford Parish Church is called St John the Baptist,It was built in 1875 to replace an earlier church.The Church as is Weaverham Parish Church is made of local Cheshire sandstone with a wooden framework roof.It cost Â£5000 to build and is now valued at Â£65,0000.
